venue.address_1: 145 Ipswich Street (Corner of Lansdowne and Ipswich)
venue.name: Jillians Boston

item.description:
Hey Everyone!


Gary has informed me that we can not get extra lanes, so we have to limit bowlers to the first 8-10 people. Anyone can come and socialize, though. Or maybe some just want to play billiards and eat. It's all good!


One of our newest members, Gary, has invited us Bowling! We can get a bite to eat there, bowl a few strings, and, if anyone is interested, play billiards afterwards! I'm including this link to their website, so you can check it out. Follow the link below for menus, directions and parking information. The cost is minimal because Gary won a couple of free lanes from 6:00 to 8:00 and is sharing them with us. Gary and I will get there early and be wearing leis. The reservations will be under his name.

Thanks, Gary, and hope to see you all sign up! Lucky Strike Website

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Bowling @ Lucky Strike Lanes (Jillians Boston)
